abstract: Buffalo promotes assistant men's basketball coach Nate Oats to replace Bobby Hurley as head coach.
lead_paragraph: Buffalo moved swiftly to replace Bobby Hurley by promoting the assistant Nate Oats to take over as coach of its men’s basketball team.

headline.main: Buffalo Promotes Assistant to Replace Bobby Hurley

snippet: Buffalo moved swiftly to replace Bobby Hurley by promoting the assistant Nate Oats to take over as coach of its men’s basketball team.
